full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BTZAN MDOS KYI LA LAG LEN GA-YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES BTZAN MDOS KYIS BCOS THABS JI LTAR BYA BA'I PHYAG LEN GA-YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, RANG GI SLOB BU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS DANG MANG POS MGRIN GCIG TU MDOS CHO GA 'DI LA 'GA' ZHIG MI GSAL BA DANG, 'DRA MIN MANG PO ZHIG 'DUG PAS PHYAG LEN CHO GA BSGRIGS, 'KHYER BDE ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, LHA BTZUN BLO BZANG YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR GYIS BSDEBS PA'O,, ,,)
